attrs.name: active-name
attrs.desc: By default, column 1 is displayed. You can select 1, 2, or 3.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 1.

attrs.name: icon
attrs.desc: Font icon of the first information in tab-item; Font icon of the first piece of information in tab-item

attrs.name: show-more
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to display the More button. The More button is displayed by default and must be used together with more-link.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: more-link
attrs.desc: More button redirection URL. This parameter is valid only when show-more is set to true. moreLink: {url:'localhost:3000/', //Redirection address. Either the URL or route attribute must be selected. The URL has a higher priority. route:'Alert', //Redirection route. Either the URL or route attribute must be selected. URL has a high priority target: '_blank', //Redirection mode text: 'More' //Link text}
